ComicInfo.Summary:
A new quest begins. New heroes and villains arrive on the scene. A threat to the whole of Warlands is launched from the world's dark heart itself. The fabled exploits of the Banished Knights are now a dim memory, but the freezing future of the Age of Ice is still to come. A new band of heroes goes in search of the power that spreads dark conflict across the globe, and the fate of an ancient sage, who may have held the key to a world's survival. Along the way, powerful antagonists, strange allies and bizarre creatures will be encountered. And, don't count the race of vampires out of the equation just yet...
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/warlands-dark-tide-rising-1-powers-and-principalit/4000-177169/
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter One: Powers and Principalities
